definitions.definition: Sour , sharp , or biting to the taste; tart ; having the taste of vinegar .

examples: His response was harsh and acid .

definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to an acid; acidic .
Denoting a musical genre that is a distortion (as if hallucinogenic) of an existing genre, as in acid house , acid jazz , acid rock .

main_definition: Sour , sharp , or biting to the taste; tart ; having the taste of vinegar .
secondary_definitions: Of or pertaining to an acid; acidic .
( music ) Denoting a musical genre that is a distortion (as if hallucinogenic) of an existing genre, as in acid house , acid jazz , acid rock .
